titleInfo.title: Letter from C Mallard, Political Agent at Laristan, to James Dow, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter concerns the movement of military forces in the Gulf. Mallard writes that the British troops have quit Raselkhyma [Ra's al-Khaymah] and have arrived at Laristan, taking up a position in the Angar Sound. Mallard continues that, as Captain Thompson has proceeded to Bombay, he has been appointed as Political Agent in Thompson's absence, and requests any information Dow has on the Wahabe [Wahhabi] tribe committing 'depredations' in any part of the Gulf.
